How to vote your Tesla shares
Here's how to vote in @Tesla's shareholder meeting:

For $TSLA shareholders who use Fidelity:
• To cast your vote online, you’ll need to search for a specific email in your inbox, which may be in your spam folder (same email address that is associated with your broker account).

El burro sabe mas que Maduro
Illegitimate Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, who very likely won reelection through fraud, is declaring war on Elon Musk, whom he calls his "arch-enemy." He claims Elon Musk wants to invade Venezuela with his space rockets.
